Articles.Content: Are there any plans to add in the a future a separate building allowing us to construct a payload from the parts provided then saving it and being able to open up this saved payload in the SPH or VAB allowing us to simply place the object on an existing launch vehicle?

A good idea, and a good alternative to subassembly saver/loader.

Hello there

As has been noted, this is a suggestion and as such belongs into Suggestions and Development Discussion. However, it is also on the What not to suggest? list as "Child assemblies / subassemblies". This is because it has been suggested over and over again. Everything that is to be said has been said, and the modded functionality is a great way to come by until something of the like becomes stock.

Moving and closing.
